languages.text: "Ваше внимание чрезвычайно лестно, господин судья. Как и возможность служить Империуму еще усерднее, нежели ранее. Кстати об усердии — мы уже проводим тщательный аудит, чтобы выяснить, какой писец неверно оценил объем поставок. Не сомневайтесь, этого гнусного преступника мы немедленно..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваше внимание чрезвычайно лестно, господин судья. Как и возможность служить Империуму еще усерднее, нежели ранее. За долгие столетия Тессера превратилась в мир, полный изобилия. Люди плодятся и размножаются, и..."

languages.text: "I am most flattered by your attention, esteemed judicator — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"
languages.original_text: "Ваше внимание чрезвычайно лестно, господин судья. Как и возможность служить Империуму еще усерднее, нежели ранее. Кстати об усердии — мы уже проводим тщательный аудит, чтобы выяснить, какой писец неверно оценил объем поставок. Не сомневайтесь, этого гнусного преступника мы немедленно..."

traits.locale_text: "I am exceedingly flattered by your attention, esteemed judge — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe was it that bungled up the tithe calculation. Fear not, the scoundrel will soon be—"

Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"

"I am most flattered by your attention, esteemed judicator — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"

languages.text: “尊敬的法务官，能得到您的关注，我感到荣幸之至。能有机会进一步为帝国效力，我心中充满欣悦。提到为帝国效力这个问题，我们目前已经在进行彻查，看看是哪个文员算错了什一税的税额。不必担心，那个混蛋很快就会——”
languages.original_text: "I am most flattered by your attention, esteemed judicator — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的法务官，能得到您的关注，我感到荣幸之至。能有机会进一步为帝国效力，我心中充满欣悦。提到为帝国效力这个问题，我们目前已经在进行彻查，看看是哪个文员算错了什一税的税额。不必担心，那个混蛋很快就会——”

languages.text: 「尊敬すべき裁判官様。ご注目いただき、光栄の極みでございます。そして、これまで以上に帝国に忠誠を尽くす機会を賜ったこと、深く感謝いたします。忠誠と言えば、誰が租税の計算を台無しにしたのか、すでに徹底的な調査を開始しております。ご安心を。その不届き者はまもなく──」
languages.original_text: "I am most flattered by your attention, esteemed judicator — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬すべき裁判官様。ご注目いただき、光栄の極みでございます。そして、これまで以上に帝国に忠誠を尽くす機会を賜ったこと、深く感謝いたします。忠誠と言えば、誰が租税の計算を台無しにしたのか、すでに徹底的な調査を開始しております。ご安心を。その不届き者はまもなく──」
「尊敬すべき裁判官様。ご注目いただき、光栄の極みでございます。そして、これまで以上に帝国に忠誠を尽くす機会を賜ったこと、深く感謝いたします。忠誠と言えば、誰が租税の計算を台無しにしたのか、すでに徹底的な調査を開始しております。ご安心を。その不届き者はまもなく──」

languages.text: «Me siento muy honrado por su atención, estimado magistrado, y por la oportunidad de servir al Imperium con más dedicación que antes. Hablando de dedicación, estábamos llevando a cabo una inspección concienzuda para descubrir qué escriba había errado en el cálculo del diezmo. No tema, el responsable pronto será...».
languages.original_text: "I am most flattered by your attention, esteemed judicator — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"

traits.locale_text: «Me siento muy honrado por su atención, estimado juez, y por la oportunidad de servir al Imperium con más dedicación que antes. Hablando de dedicación, estábamos llevando a cabo una inspección concienzuda para descubrir qué escriba había errado en el cálculo del diezmo. No tema, el responsable pronto será...».

languages.text: "İlginize ziyadesiyle mazhar oldum saygıdeğer hâkim. İmparatorluk'a eskisinden daha büyük bir adanmışlıkla hizmet etme fırsatına da. Adanmışlık demişken... Aşar hesabında hata yapan kâtibin kimliğini tespit etmek için kapsamlı bir inceleme başlattı. Korkmayın, o alçak yakında..."
languages.original_text: "I am most flattered by your attention, esteemed judicator — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"

traits.locale_text: "İlginize ziyadesiyle mazhar oldum saygıdeğer hâkim. İmparatorluk'a eskisinden daha büyük bir adanmışlıkla hizmet etme fırsatına da. Adanmışlık demişken... Aşar hesabında hata yapan kâtibin kimliğini tespit etmek için kapsamlı bir inceleme başlattı. Korkmayın, o alçak yakında..."

languages.text: « Je suis profondément flatté par votre attention, noble juge, et par cette occasion de servir l'Imperium avec plus de dévouement que jamais. En parlant de dévouement... nous avons lancé une inspection approfondie afin de déterminer quel scribe pourrait avoir faussé les calculs de la dîme. N'ayez crainte, cette canaille sera bientôt... »
languages.original_text: "I am most flattered by your attention, esteemed judicator — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis profondément flatté par votre attention, noble juge, et par cette occasion de servir l'Imperium avec plus de dévouement que jamais. En parlant de dévouement... nous avons lancé une inspection approfondie afin de déterminer quel scribe pourrait avoir faussé les calculs de la dîme. N'ayez crainte, cette canaille sera bientôt... »

languages.text: "Ich empfinde Euer Interesse als schmeichelhaft, hochgeschätzter Judikator ... und diese Möglichkeit, dem Imperium mit noch größerer Hingabe als bisher zu dienen. Apropos Hingabe ... wir führen bereits eine gründliche Untersuchung durch, um herauszufinden, welcher Schreiber die Berechnung des Zehnts vermasselt hat. Keine Sorge. Der Schurke wird bald ..."
languages.original_text: "I am most flattered by your attention, esteemed judicator — and by this opportunity to serve the Imperium with even greater dedication than before. Speaking of dedication, we are already conducting a thorough inspection to see which scribe it was that bungled the tithe calculation. Fear not: the scoundrel shall soon be—"

traits.locale_text: "Ich empfinde Euer Interesse als schmeichelhaft, hochgeschätzter Richter ... und diese Möglichkeit, dem Imperium mit noch größerer Hingabe als bisher zu dienen. Apropos Hingabe ... wir führen bereits eine gründliche Untersuchung durch, um herauszufinden, welcher Schreiber die Berechnung des Zehnts vermasselt hat. Keine Sorge. Der Schurke wird bald ..."
